items.question: How long does website development take?
items.answer: The time depends on the chosen plan and project scope. On average, a project is completed in 5-30 days.

items.question: What does the website cost depend on?
items.answer: The cost depends on the chosen plan, number of pages, and amount of information.

items.question: Do I need to buy domain and hosting myself?
items.answer: No, 1 year domain and 1 month hosting are provided by us.

items.question: How does the process work after ordering?
items.answer: First, we develop the project structure and agree with you, then the work begins.

items.question: Will there be technical support after launch?
items.answer: Yes. After launch, we provide free technical support for 1 to 3 months.

hero.title: A professional website for your business — only $87

why.title: Why exactly $87?
why.reason: Right now, our top priority is building more real projects, a strong portfolio, and results-based case studies. That's why we're offering a special launch deal for 10 clients.
why.price_note: $87 is a price with minimal profit, but without compromising on quality.
benefits: We build our portfolio with real projects to level up
why.closing: Once 10 projects are completed, the price goes up.

problem.title: Why does your business need a website?

items.title: Can clients find you on Google?
items.description: If not — you don't exist. A website builds trust and credibility.

items.title: Is your business dependent only on social media?
items.description: Your own website is a platform you own and control.

items.title: You're running ads, but where do you send clients?
items.description: A website is the central page that converts traffic into orders.
